TopicTitle: Keyboard & mouse adapter with KSP EE

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm thinking about buying keyboard & mouse adapter for PS4 (like XIM APEX or HAMA SPEEDSHOT) to make playing KSP EE easier.  I could then quickly and precisely move the arrow on the screen with mouse (in cursor preset controls mode). 

Is it good idea?

Edited January 7, 2019 by Invenisso

So... curiosity won... ;-) Let it be my contribution to the community... :-)

I bought Hama Speedshot and tried to set up a configuration that works well with KSP EE. Unfortunately, it could not be done. The converter simulates the left joystick or right joystick by moving the mouse. When you press ESC + Insert on the keyboard - the converter simulates the left one and when you press ESC + Delete - simulates the right one. But in KSP EE you use two joysticks at the same time. You would have to constantly switch between what the mouse simulates. That would be impractical and time-consuming.
So I do not advise you to buy such converters for use with KSP EE. They are optimized for use in FPP games.
I thought about this too, but using gimx project. If I have time I will try.
